meanings.definition: The act of notifying or informing someone.
meanings.sent1: She received a notification about the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The notification on her phone reminded her of the appointment.
meanings.sent3: The notification from the teacher made the students excited for the surprise test.
meanings.sent4: The notification of the new policy spread quickly among the employees.
meanings.sent5: The notification of the emergency evacuation was loud and clear.

meanings.definition: A message or alert that provides information or updates.
meanings.sent1: He checked his email for any important notifications.
meanings.sent2: The notification on the website informed users of the upcoming maintenance.
meanings.sent3: The notification on his phone made him jump with surprise.
meanings.sent4: The notification of the new product launch created a buzz in the market.
meanings.sent5: The notification of the weather warning was timely and helpful.
